channel.title: How would you?
channel.description: Make it have a message that you need to register...I want it like the one on here when you first register and it makes you take a quiz like that... by the way i ain't using smfforfree i'm using smf but i'm hosting it on a website so yeah.

item.title: How would you?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Umm, this would take some manual hard coding.

Instead of having the submit button redirect you do “OMG YOU REGISTERED”, you can have it send it elsewhere, then send back to “OMG YOU REGISTERED.”

Read full topic
